org.opensky.libadsb

Class tools

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opensky.libadsb.tools

  • public class tools
extends java.lang.Object
    Some useful functions when working with libadsb. Mostly we need these functions since the library often works with arrays of bytes which are not really readable for humans or basic operations are missing.
